metadata.title: CVE-2023-33461 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: iniparser v4.1 is vulnerable to NULL Pointer Dereference in function iniparser_getlongint which misses check NULL for function iniparser_getstring's return.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-07-04, there is no upstream fix available yet

criterions.comment: iniparser package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-04').
